Privacy Policy  

Effective Date: 03/28/2025  

 

Welcome to PeakAntiVirus, a mobile application developed by PeakAntiVirus (“we,” “us,” or “our”). Your privacy is our priority. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and disclose your information when you interact with PeakAntiVirus. By using the App, you consent to the practices described herein.  

 

Scope  

This policy applies to PeakAntiVirus and its services, including updates and features (collectively, the “App”). It does not govern third-party platforms accessible via the App.  

 

Definitions  

  • Personal Information: Data identifying you directly/indirectly (e.g., name, email, phone number).  
  • Usage Information: Details about your App interactions (e.g., features used, content accessed).  
  • Cookies & Similar Technologies: Tools like cookies, web beacons, or pixels that store/retrieve device data.  

 

Information We Collect  

We may gather the following:  

 

Personal Information  

  • Contact details (name, email, phone, address).  
  • Account credentials (username, password, preferences).  
  • Payment information (credit card, billing address).  
  • Location data (GPS, IP address).  
  • Demographic details (age, gender, language).  
  • Device specifics (OS, browser, device type).  

 

Usage Information  

  • Log data (IP address, referral URLs, access times).  
  • Usage metrics (pages viewed, session duration).  
  • Installed Application List: We collect and upload your device’s app list to TrustLook’s virus database ([https://www.trustlook.com/](https://www.trustlook.com/)) to scan for security threats and enhance device protection.  

 

Cookies & Similar Technologies  

Used to:  

  • Remember preferences/settings.  
  • Enable seamless sign-in.  
  • Personalize content/ads.  
  • Analyze App performance.  
  • Prevent fraud and improve security.  

 

How We Use Your Information  

  • App Functionality: Create/manage accounts, enable features, personalize experiences, and conduct R&D.  
  • Analytics: Improve App quality via usage pattern analysis.  
  • Communication: Respond to inquiries, send updates, and deliver promotional messages (opt-out available).  
  • Security: Scan installed apps via TrustLook ([https://www.trustlook.com/](https://www.trustlook.com/)) to detect risks. TrustLook SDK analyzes apps for static/behavioral risks.  
  • Third-Party Analytics: Firebase ([https://firebase.google.com/](https://firebase.google.com/)) processes data for business intelligence, ads, and recommendations. Review Firebase’s privacy practices [here](https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy).  

 

Information Sharing  

We disclose your data to:  

  • Service Providers: For hosting, payments, and support (limited to necessary tasks).  
  • Business Partners: Advertisers/analytics firms for personalized content/ads.  
  • Legal Authorities: In response to lawful requests (subpoenas, court orders).  
  • Third Parties During Mergers/Acquisitions: With privacy safeguards in place.  
  • With Consent: If explicitly permitted by you.  

 

Data Retention  

We retain personal data only as long as necessary for stated purposes or as legally required.  

 

Security Measures  

We employ administrative, physical, and technical safeguards to protect your data. Note that no system is 100% secure.  

 

Children’s Privacy  

PeakAntiVirus is not intended for users under 13. We do not knowingly collect data from children.  

 

Your Rights  

You may:  

  • Access, correct, or delete your data.  
  • Object to or restrict processing.  
  • Withdraw consent.  
  • Request data portability.  

Contact us at info.motiurrahmankhan@gmail.com to exercise these rights.  

 

Policy Updates  

We may revise this policy periodically. Continued App use after revisions constitutes acceptance.  

 

Contact Us  

For questions, contact info.motiurrahmankhan@gmail.com.  

 

Governing Law & Disputes  

This policy is governed by U.S. law. Disputes unresolved via negotiation shall be arbitrated by HKIAC under its Administered Arbitration Rules.  

 

Additional Disclosures  

  • EU Residents: GDPR compliance includes lawful bases (contractual necessity, legitimate interests, consent) and potential data transfers outside the EEA with safeguards.  
  • Marketing Opt-Out: Unsubscribe via included links or email us. Transactional messages will still be sent.  
  • Third-Party Ads/Analytics: Partners like Google Analytics, AdMob, and Facebook Ads may track activity. Review their privacy policies for details.  
  • California Residents: CCPA grants rights to access, delete, or opt out of data sales. See our CCPA Notice for details.  
  • Do Not Track: We currently do not respond to DNT signals.  

 

Thank you for trusting PeakAntiVirus. We are committed to safeguarding your privacy.  

Contact: info.motiurrahmankhan@gmail.com for clarifications.
